basic.Peptide Name: Vasostatin-1 (VS-1; N-terminal fragment of Chromogranin-A; mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Micrococcus luteus (MIC=2 µM), Bacillus megaterium (MIC=0.2 µM).Fungi:Neurospora crassa (MIC=3 µM), Aspergillus fumigatus (MIC=5 µM), Alternaria brassicicola (MIC=3 µM), Nectria haematococca (MIC=1 µM), Fusarium culmorum (MIC=1 µM), F. oxyporum (MIC=10 µM), Saccharomyces cerevisiae (MIC=10 µM), Candida albicans (MIC=10 µM).
